title: Reckless
description: Lead detectives and family members speak to Dateline about the case of teenager Michelle Carter, who was convicted of bullying her boyfriend to kill himself. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 8, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
